dict.acceptation: 大概；或许；很可能；备不住；

sent.orig: Some elderly aunt probably offered that advice at some point and you probably dismissed it.
sent.trans: 部分年长的女人可能会提出这样的忠告，你也可能对此表示不屑。

sent.orig: Pee is probably just playing around, using his playboy skills. that's probably all.
sent.trans: Pee只是用他花花公子的本事，在那里玩一下而已。只是这样。

sent.orig: Man 1: Probably way to go, probably way to go. Jeff, thanks for joining us.
sent.trans: 男人1:该那么做，该那么做。Jeff,谢谢参与我们的节目。

sent.orig: Local control of education probably probably was a good ideal 20 idea 200 years ago.
sent.trans: 各地分别控制教育可能在200年前是一个很好的方法。

sent.orig: Ther result shows that the mechanism is probably that the electrostatic field polarizes the catalase solution.
sent.trans: 研究表明：高压静电场对酶活力的稳定作用很可能是高压静电场使酶及溶液发生极化作用产生的。
